Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Launching Spaza Eats has been the most stubborn thing I‚Äôve done this year The engine is huge that it needs every detailed attention to get it to work. Creating a team from System thinking Engineers level to managing merchants, Managing logistics, Order dispatch per minute, per location, per city and brand partnerships I had to be flexible and realise that I might not have the time to run Analytics Advertising so I went to get a very sharp CEO to lead the team. Although I remained an innovator in the business through problem solving and providing technology solutions , it helped lift off so much weight that comes with managing a medium enterpriseAnalytics Advertising has been doing so well under new leadership, we removed the culture of entitlement without executing and we begin to focus on targets , retention and employee wellbeing Spaza Eats on the other hand came with its own direct challenges and quick growth with partnerships that needs attention direclty. I had to realise the Food delivery category will need a COO as we plan to launch e-commerce within the platform in 2024 Focusing on AnalyticsX and portfolio management has been fun on a high level but it comes with its own pain and a greater long term X to solve.Above it all, I still remained stubborn on the vision and flexible on details If you‚Äôre not stubborn, you‚Äôll give up on experiments too soon. And if you‚Äôre not flexible, you‚Äôll pound your head against the wall and you won‚Äôt see a different solution to a problem you‚Äôre trying to solve.‚úçüèæWE ARE THE ANSWER TO WHAT GOD KNEW WILL BE A PROBLEM üí´

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: I grew up in Louis Trichard  old town , Ask about me, All I know is entrepreneurship I was moving fruit and vegetables in 99I learned independence and positioning When I built Analytics Advertising it was about building bespoke tech solutions to help organisations expand better. Now that company is 14 x award winning medium enterprise We used Machine learning and Data Engineering models to drive decisions Now I‚Äôm running Spaza Eats sitting on Data, geo locations and multi industries in one platform We are moving fast food , groceries and e-commerceWe are directly creating jobs through deliveries with over 550 drivers The blueprint to activate the economics in the continent is with me, they can claim to have it but when it comes to action , they don‚Äôt know what to do, they can‚Äôt walk in Pheli like meI was always ready to work , every opportunity that ever came to me I seized it.

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: ‚ÄúLose the battles but win the WAR‚Äù2021 I got a chance to be a top 5 finalist entrepreneur of the year and I didn‚Äôt win the award. Part of what got me to not win I believe, is that I came out arrogant when they asked what do you plan to do to help create jobs in the townshipsI talked about a food and grocery delivery model that I strongly believed would work in the township. Judges thought otherwise and believed that ‚ÄúI will need insurance and risky measures before even development as townships are not safe , drivers will eat peoples food‚ÄùI did not disagree to this statement but I was also aware that I‚Äôm talking to people who haven‚Äôt lived in the township so I told them I‚Äôll have to get the model to work before I put measures Fast forward 31 December 2023 , Spaza Eats is actively helping over 350 drivers , No crime recorded yet, More than 800 active merchants and Customers are downloading the platform everyday I might have lost the award but I definitely won the war Grand strategy is the art of looking beyond the present battle and calculating aheadüôèüí´

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Proud to see Tech startups in the country, continent and the diaspora taking shape I‚Äôve been studying Paga, Paystack , Flatterwave in Nigeria üá≥üá¨ , M-pesa in Kenya üá∞üá™ and Ecocash and Mukuru in Zimbabwe üáøüáº Amazing to see tech startups emerging and solving the continents problems from the bottom level I see Spaza Eats in the same category , with access to capital and competitive resources it can all be done to have the platform in every country within the countinent and out of the countinent I think there‚Äôs a huge need for local governments to recorgnize these solutions and invest as much as they can to grow their countries image through them Tech startups is by far the best way to create many jobs for the youth right now , gone are the days for Transnet to carry so many labour force.Being a startup founder myself , I see the importance of putting South Africa and the continent on the Map through Spaza Eats Having to step down on a successful business Analytics Advertising  and start again , it‚Äôs a load of learning and unlearning but most importantly I see direct impact In less than a year, I‚Äôve been able to create so many jobs in a short period of time and I can see the Spaza Eats adoption in the township is beyond expected, way better than what the theoriest told you. Just a thought on how much can be done collectively through this platform ‚úÖ

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Slavery was a system that depended on the creation of deep levels of fear, You rise above fear and you find your freedom It‚Äôs a psychological illness to operate for years under an uncomfortable position and you are the director.It means you don‚Äôt think worthy of yourself , you don‚Äôt believe in you enough. This is the difference between me and many people , I don‚Äôt operate in that atmosphere, I always know when the energy is off and when someone is trying to put me in pyschological chainsSpiritualize your warfare. Every day you face battles‚Äîthat is the reality for all creatures in their struggle to survive. But the greatest battle of all is with yourself‚Äîyour weaknesses, your emotions, your lack of resolution in seeing things through to the end. ‚ÄúA finish mindset‚Äù You must declare unceasing war on yourself. As a warrior in life, you welcome combat and conflict as ways to prove yourself, to better your skills, to gain courage, confidence, and experience. Being attacked is a sign that you are important enough to be a target üéØ God is King

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: I‚Äôm excited!!! Spaza Eats is taking off It feels like like a dream to see something from thought level to existence. What people don‚Äôt realise is that, you have to see the technology working in every part ‚ÄúSystem thinking approach‚Äù from your imagination before it comes to live When I see 20 orders in real time on the Spaza Eats system I get excited because my focus is to see the system working without us directly involved. Now scalling 20 orders in real time to 300 orders it‚Äôs a game of probabilities and I thought I‚Äôm the guy who built Analytics Advertising I was in Russia when I realised I need to bring a technology that will connect the continent through their local cuisines and fortunately majority of us in Africa know that we can‚Äôt survive everyday with burgers and chips. Seeing drivers creating monies per week to feed their families and restaurants increasing their customer base and even asking for Spaza Eats brand on their walls it‚Äôs fascinating If we keep going , we definitely have the best album for 2024

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Spaza Eats is officially trading in Limpopo Polokwane, Mankweng , Louis Trichardt and Thohoyandou

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Why Spaza Eats ? I grew up in Louis Trichardt, Old town helping my mother who was a basic survivalist entrepreneur. I wasn‚Äôt passionate about entrepreneurship then but I saw the impact of how these laddies were proving for their families everyday.The birth of my entrepreneurship journey started in Matric when I was tasked to find a real business near me and ask for ther their old financial statements and try to audit them.I got a chance to talk to a Zoutpansburg Maize Meal company and got to see some of their financials.I was flabbergasted when I saw the monthly figures, I couldn‚Äôt believe 6 Million was generated monthly and I started asking myself how does one do this ? The company hired so many general workers who were serving their families every ‚Äúfortnight‚ÄùAfter successfully building a sustainable Analytics Advertising I started feeling the importance of creating a platform for everyone , A platform that doesn‚Äôt need a matric to make money for yourself and your family through delivery. I came up with a concept of Spaza Eats in 2019 to serve the basic survivalist entrepreneurs who doesn‚Äôt have technology knowledge to scale their business Spaza Eats  was not ready to launch then, the community wasn‚Äôt ready for us. I also got to share this idea at Rising Stars in 2021 run on how I plan to serve so many unemployed people The judges definitely didn‚Äôt catch the spirit üòéThe vision stayed with me until now when I realised, I have to create the economics in the township until the solution works We launched Spaza Eats with a knowing that the economics in the township is still behind from network, illiteracy and Crime and that should be our longway struggle to Economic Freedom and to create sustainable jobs. We are now working with over 3000 restaurants on spaza eats and more than 5000 buying customers after 4 weeks of launching this technology and we are still in the beginningBeyond Restaurants , we plan to create a digital market place for the Township We are already signing creative partnerships with some of the largest corporations in the country that I will get to share soon Sometimes the system will be against you but remember your WHY Lastly, Beyond Ethnics , You are all welcome to buy your Lunch and Dinner at Spaza Eats Download on { Huawei ‚Ä¢ Android ‚Ä¢ IOS }

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: We are no longer doing business to prove a point but to create sustainable structures.It‚Äôs about the foundation and sustainability of our existence to create a platform for future innovators (We are planting trees üå≥)More I try to solve for longevity I‚Äôm reminded that is never about profits but more about shared value and  making a difference in others directly Let what you do become a blueprint or a redirection for someone to find their path. Let your existence create a dent in humanity AnalyticsX

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Winning Brics entrepreneur of the year in Russia opened my eyes to a new a dimension. I realised then that, it's time to move to the next level of solving continental problems directly. I then realised I need to let go of managing Analytics Advertising and hand it over to my wife Pabalelo Banks Although I still support in partnerships and opening new shop in other countries, I can safely say the company has been existing without me for over 4 months. I  am focused on the group company AnalyticsX  housing 5 individual entites at the moment Some say "I love juggling things" and some say "he is a risk taker" but simply I just love solving for XOne of the few subjects I could get an A+ in class.  The continent has so many young innovators who are looking for platforms to perfome their skills and talents. I dream to be one of those who build a headquaters for them.#growthmindset #teamwork #impactfulsolutions #industryinsights

Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: ‚ÄúTwo roads diverged in a yellow wood, I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.‚ÄùAfter walking this journey for 7 years , I can safely say , success has a relationship with Faith, passion , talent & habits You have to truly believe with a strong conviction, aware carefully of your true talent and develop a consistent habit. Thank you to Professor Ben and the tt100 Business Innovation Awards Programme for including us in the 2023 program 6 awards in one night is definitely a representation that we are leading the Data technology industry. Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: Fail Fast, Fail Forward üéØTruth is creating a platform for the township requires brain work.We fail often & make adjustments , revise our strategy to fail forwardFunded? Not yet, Bootstrapping, Data and Creativity 2021 I shared with judges at rising stars how the prophecy shall come to pass2023 I shared on Prophet Penuel Mlotshwa the blueprint 2024 you see us, you see the energy, you see the partnerships, you see the sponsors. Author: Talifhani Banks
Post Text: People say townships are risky and unfriendly & in the same token don‚Äôt take into consideration what causes the threats. A hungry stomach can do anything , I can safely say I could fallen into that category easy What drove me to build Spaza Eats platform was to create economics for the bottom pyramid, the general public and big contributors to the GDP to start transacting amongst each other digitally and safeWe are already seeing a trend of development and outlets increasing turnovers through this Engine, drivers transacting weekly to afford their families Only God knows how far we can go
